full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, DR SHABIR Z MASTH residing at 8 BURNING TREE ROAD , (Name) (Street and number) NATICK MASS 01760 USA (City) (State) (ZIP Code, if in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 04/06/1934 at PENDRA ROAD INDIA Also, answer either a, b or c, as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number FOIA (b)(6) 2. That I am 42 years of age and have resided in the United States since AUGUST 1968-70 ; JULY 1973 - PRESENT 3. of the person(s) residing at SBURNING TREE ROAD NATICK That this affidavit is executed in behalf following at present MASS. 01760 USA COUNTRY MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO NAME SEX AGE OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT MRS ASHRITA Z MASIH F 66 INDIA WIDOW MOTHER 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of ASST. PROFESSOR with MASS. COLLEGE OF PHARMACY (Name of concern) at BOSTON MASS and derive a net annual income of $18,800 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country 3000 (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $10,000 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ 0 market value. as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 8 BURNING TREE ROAD,RATICK valued at 46,000 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $42,000 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $ 56,000 , cash surrender value of $ - (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See instructions for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) WHOLLY PARTIALLY NAME OF PERSON DEPENDENT AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME DEPENDENT MANJULA MASIH 32 WIFE EMPLOYED $ 7200 P.A. FOIA (b)(6) Form I-134 (Rev. 3-1-76)N
